name: Turn Undead
trigger: when you present your holy symbol against Undead within 30 feet
effects: each Undead of your choice within 30 feet must make a Wisdom saving throw
on a failed save, the creature is Frightened and Incapacitated for 1 minute and tries to move as far from you as it can
limits: the effect ends early if the creature takes any damage, if you have the Incapacitated condition, or if you die
